title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Orff Music Game-Based Pedagogy Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Music Theory and Instrument Performance Experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand the fundamental principles of Orff music games and apply them to actual educational contexts.
Learners can design creative music education activities using gamification techniques.
Learners can analyze core elements of music game-based instruction in mobile environments and establish evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
